response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $10,000 to you. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $9,500. This is a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
